verbose_text: Hits 2 and 3 selected by pharmacophore-B (XREF_FIG A) exhibited more than 70% inhibition of APN, while hit 1 selected by pharmacophore-A (XREF_FIG B) inhibited 56% of APN; none of hits 4-6 selected by pharmacophore-A displayed APN inhibition more than 50%.
evidence: hit 1 selected by pharmacophore-A ( XREF_FIG B) inhibited 56% of APN
